name: Tower Bauer
description:
Tower Bauer is an educational game to help understand the basic rules of fractions. The goal is to build your tower as high as you can. Make it higher by slicing some bricks, putting them together in a new shape, weighing them on a scale and smelting them together. With four fun little minigames, the concepts of fractions can be easily understood while also having a good time.

This game was created as a semester project by Petorio:
Peter Hofbauer
Viktoria Ronacher
